1037.question: By how much do they outperform BiLSTMs in Sentiment Analysis?
1037.response: {'Answer': 'On the Amazon Reviews dataset, RCRNs outperform BiLSTMs by at most 10.4% (90.5 vs 80.1), while on the IMDB binary sentiment classification task, RCRNs outperform BiLSTMs by at most 5.4% (96.2 vs 90.9).'}
1037.answer: Proposed RCRN outperforms ablative baselines BiLSTM by +2.9% and 3L-BiLSTM by +1.1% on average across 16 datasets.
